itemDescription: Professor of Evolutionary Genetics at the University of Bath

wikipedia_page.main: Laurence Daniel Hurst (born 6 January 1965)  is a Professor of Evolutionary Genetics in the Department of Biology and Biochemistry at the University of Bath and the director of the Milner Centre for Evolution.

response: *6 January – Laurence Hurst, biologist and academic

From 1991-94, he completed a Bachelor of Arts degree in Biological Sciences at the University of Oxford.Gil McVean's  He completed his PhD in the Department of Genetics at the University of Cambridge supervised by Laurence Hurst in 1998.
